name: Countrypedia
description: In Progress - A REST Countries API with color theme switcher. The user is able to browse all countries on main page, click on a country to get more information, search for a country, filter by continent, and toggle betwwen light and dark themes

name: Volvo Cars
description: In this application, the user is able to browse all cars, to filter the cars by type. When clicking on the Learn and Shop links, the user is brought to another page to learn about the car or to purchase the car

name: Ubiquity
description: With this app, the user is able to browse all products in a list or grid view, to search for products, to filter by category, and to click on a product to get more information
